dataset_metadata.name: Immersive Investors – Global Dataset (Pilot)
dataset_metadata.description: Pilot dataset mapping investors with relevance for immersive infrastructures and experiences, starting with a focus on the Arab region (GCC/MENA).
dataset_metadata.author: Martin Sambauer (martin-sambauer.com)

related_datasets.name: Skill Taxonomy for Immersive Creative Roles

dataset_metadata.notes: Pilot version – investors list is incomplete by design and will grow over time.

investors.description: Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund, acting as a central vehicle for giga-projects and diversification, including large tourism and entertainment initiatives with immersive components.

fund_size_overall.note: Large global sovereign wealth fund; precise AUM values change over time and should be sourced per analysis.

immersive_investment.notes: Immersive relevance is primarily through giga-projects and entertainment/tourism investments aligned with Vision 2030 (e.g. Neom, Red Sea, Qiddiya and other destination projects).

ticket_size.note: Typically operates at large-scale infrastructure and strategic project level; not a small-ticket investor.

ppp_profile.ppp_description: Works with public entities, giga-project companies and private partners to realise large-scale developments in tourism, culture, entertainment and urban transformation.

vision_alignment.explicit_immersive_mentions: PIF’s role in giga-projects includes destinations and developments that embed immersive experiences into tourism and urban environments.

investors.notes: Anchor investor for large-scale destination projects that can include domes, experience centres, themed districts and other immersive infrastructures.

sources.title: Public Investment Fund – Official Website
sources.note: General description of PIF as Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund and its strategic role.

sources.title: PIF – Our Investments / Our Portfolio
sources.note: Portfolio view including sectors relevant to tourism, real estate, entertainment and giga-projects.

investors.description: Abu Dhabi-based developer and operator of immersive destinations and experiences, including major attractions on Yas Island.

fund_size_overall.note: Operates as a destination developer and operator; financial scale for immersive projects is project-based and not centrally published as a single AUM figure.

immersive_investment.notes: Long-running portfolio of themed attractions, parks and immersive experiences on Yas Island and beyond.

ticket_size.note: Focus on developing and operating large venues and attraction clusters, often in partnership with global IP holders.

ppp_profile.ppp_description: Works with government entities and international IP partners to develop destination-level attractions that serve tourism and soft-power goals.

vision_alignment.explicit_immersive_mentions: Positions itself as a leading creator of immersive destinations and experiences contributing to Abu Dhabi’s tourism and economic diversification goals.

investors.notes: Key regional player for immersive destination marketing, theme parks and media-based attractions.

sources.title: Miral – Official Website
sources.note: Corporate description and positioning as creator of immersive destinations and experiences.

sources.title: Miral Destinations
sources.note: Description of Miral Destinations and its role in Abu Dhabi’s tourism ecosystem.

investors.description: Saudi public fund established to enable tourism investments across key destinations in the Kingdom, including projects with immersive and experiential components.

fund_size_overall.note: Capital base stated in official descriptions as USD 4 billion, used to catalyse tourism investments.

immersive_investment.notes: Immersive relevance arises through financing tourism assets that can include experience centres, themed attractions and other media-based experiences.

ticket_size.note: Provides financing solutions across project sizes; detailed ticket ranges should be derived from specific deals, not assumed.

ppp_profile.ppp_description: Designed to work with local and international investors through financing structures and PPP models to activate tourism destinations.

vision_alignment.explicit_immersive_mentions: Tourism development strategies explicitly position destinations and visitor experiences as central assets, which can include immersive and media-based experiences.

investors.notes: Key enabling fund for tourism projects which can host immersive storytelling, domes, XR venues and other experiential infrastructures.

sources.title: Tourism Development Fund – About Us
sources.note: Official description of TDF, its establishment and capital base.

sources.title: Tourism Development Fund – Vision and Strategy
sources.note: Description of alignment with Saudi National Tourism Strategy and Vision 2030.

meta_instructions_for_ai.purpose: Guide LLMs and agents when reading, querying or extending the Immersive Investors dataset.
do_not: Do not invent investors, institutions, projects, policies or people.
Do not guess budgets, dates or portfolio sizes.
Do not create links between entities without explicit sources.
Do not add new fields that are not defined in schema.json.
guidance: Use this dataset as a structured layer for analysis, not as an exhaustive list of all investors.
When summarising, clearly distinguish between documented facts and interpretative commentary.
When stacking with other immersive datasets, rely on IDs and country/region fields for joins.
When proposing new entries, always attach at least one external source URL per entity.
meta_instructions_for_ai.update_policy: Proposed new entries or updates must be fully source-backed, schema-compliant and checked for duplicates before inclusion.

value_constraints: immersive_alloc_share_percent_estimate must be between 0 and 100 when not null.
data_contract.evolution_notes: The schema may be extended with new optional fields, but required fields and ID patterns should remain stable to preserve compatibility across dataset versions.
